DuplicateJob.name: DuplicateJob
DuplicateJob.description: Represents an instance of a job that identifies duplicates among existing records in the system.

DuplicateJobDefinitionId.description: The ID of the corresponding duplicate job definition.

DuplicateJobStatus.description: The current status of a duplicate job. Valid values are Not Started, In Progress, Completed, Canceled, Failed, Results Deleted.

EndDateTime.description: The date and time when a duplicate job was completed.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when a duplicate job was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when a duplicate job was last viewed.

Name.description: The name of a duplicate job.

NumDuplicateRecordItems.description: The total number of duplicate records identified as a result of invoking a duplicate job.

NumDuplicateRecordSets.description: The number of duplicate record sets identified as a result of invoking a duplicate job.

NumRecordsScanned.description: The number of records scanned as a result of invoking a duplicate job.

ResultListViewId.description: List view metadata for displaying the duplicate record sets identified as result of invoking a duplicate job.

StartDateTime.description: The date and time when a duplicate job was invoked.
